targets.expr: topk(5, histogram_quantile(0.50, sum by (le, method) (rate(calls_time_bucket{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[5m]))))
topk(5, histogram_quantile(0.90, sum by (le, method) (rate(calls_time_bucket{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[5m]))))

panels.description:
Monitors RocksDB write stall risk.

**L0 Files Thresholds:**
- Yellow line (15): Warning - approaching slowdown
- Red line (20): Critical - RocksDB throttles writes
- Stop at 36 files

**Immutable MemTables:**
- Stall when >= max_write_buffer_number (default 5)
panels.title: Write Stall Indicators

panels.description:
Monitors compaction backlog and memtable data size.

**Pending Compaction Thresholds:**
- Yellow line (32 GiB): Warning - compaction falling behind
- Red line (64 GiB): Critical - risk of write stalls

**MemTable Data:**
- Current data stored in memtables (before flush to SST files)
panels.title: Compaction & MemTable Data

panels.description:
Shows the distribution of SST files across LSM tree levels.

- **L0**: Recently flushed files (uncompacted, overlapping keys)
- **L1-L6**: Compacted files (sorted, non-overlapping)

A healthy database has few/no L0 files with data distributed across deeper levels.
panels.title: LSM Tree Level Distribution

panels.description: Total time to close a block (P50, P95, P99). Note: Bucket boundaries may cause interpolation artifacts.
panels.title: Close Block Total Duration (P50, P95, P99)

panels.description: Full block production time from start to close (P50, P95, P99)
panels.title: Block Production Time (P50, P95, P99)
